abstract: Groupon’s I.P.O. filing reveals yet another unusual quirk of its chief executive, Andrew D. Mason: He’ll only receive $575 in base salary this year.
snippet: Groupon’s I.P.O. filing reveals yet another unusual quirk of its chief executive, Andrew D. Mason: He’ll only receive $575 in base salary this year.
lead_paragraph: Andrew D. Mason, Groupon’s eccentric chief executive, is presiding over one of the hottest tech companies of the moment.

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
